    Chapter 5. Factory Method Pattern

    ğŸ”” Factory Method Pattern

    ìƒì„±í•˜ëŠ” ê³µì¥ì€ ë”± í•˜ë‚˜. ê·¸ëŸ¬ë‚˜ ì–´ë–»ê²Œ ìƒì„±í• ì§€ì— ëŒ€í•œ ì—¬ëŸ¬ ë°©ì‹ë“¤ì„ ê³µì¥ì˜ ìì‹ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë“¤ë¡œ êµ¬í˜„.

    • ë‹¤ì–‘í•œ ìì‹ë“¤ì„ ìƒì„±í•˜ê³  ë¦¬í„´í•˜ëŠ” íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ëŠ” ë”± í•˜ë‚˜ë§Œ ë‘ê³ 
      • ì–´ë–¤ ë°©ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ëª‡ê°œ ìƒì„±í• ì§€ ë“±ë“± ì´ëŸ° ì–´ë–¤ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ìƒì„±í• ì§€ì— ê´€í•œ ìƒì„±ì˜ í˜•íƒœëŠ” íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ìƒì†í•˜ëŠ” ì„œë¸Œ íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë“¤ì—ê²Œ ë§¡ê¸´ë‹¤.
        • ìƒì„± í˜•íƒœëŠ” ì—¬ëŸ¬ê°€ì§€ê°€ ìˆìœ¼ë¯€ë¡œ ì„œë¸Œ íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë“¤ì€ ì—¬ëŸ¬ê°œê°€ ìˆì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.
    • ì˜¤ë¸Œì íŠ¸ ìƒì‚° ê³µì¥ ğŸ‘‰ íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ (ë¶€ëª¨)
    • ì˜¤ë¸Œì íŠ¸ì˜ ì—¬ëŸ¬ê°€ì§€ ìƒì‚° ë°©ì‹ë“¤ ğŸ‘‰ ì„œë¸Œ íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ (ìì‹ë“¤)

    ë¶€ëª¨ì¸ íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë¡œ ì„œë¸Œ íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë“¤ì„ ì°¸ì¡°í•˜ë©´, íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ ì…ì¥ì—ì„  ë­˜ ì–´ë–»ê²Œ ìƒì„±í•˜ëŠ”ì§€ ì•Œ í•„ìš” ì—†ì´ ê·¸ëƒ¥ ìƒì„±ë§Œ í•´ì£¼ë©´ ëœë‹¤. ğŸ‘‰ ë‹¤í˜•ì„±

    • ìœ ì§€ ë³´ìˆ˜ê°€ í¸ë¦¬
      • ìƒì„± ë°©ì‹ë“¤ì„ ì¶”ê°€/ìˆ˜ì •í• ë• ì„œë¸Œ íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ ë‚´ìš©ì„ ìˆ˜ì •í•˜ê±°ë‚˜ ì„œë¸Œ íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ ë˜ ë‹¤ë¥¸ê±° í•˜ë‚˜ ë” ì¶”ê°€í•˜ê±°ë‚˜ ê·¸ë ‡ê²Œë§Œ í•˜ë©´ ëœë‹¤.
      • íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ìˆ˜ì •í•  í•„ìš”ëŠ” ì—†ë‹¤.


    ğŸ”” ì˜ˆì œ 1

    • ğŸ“œUnit ì¶”ìƒ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
      • ğŸ“œMarine ìƒì†
        • Attack() ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”©
      • ğŸ“œFirebat ìƒì†
        • Attack() ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”©
    • ğŸ§¾UnitGenerator ì¶”ìƒ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
      • íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
        • Unit (marine, firebat) ë“¤ì„ ìƒì„±í•˜ê³  ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì— ë‹´ëŠ”ë‹¤.
        • ìƒì‚°ë°©ì‹ì´ A,B ë‘ê°€ì§€ê°€ ìˆë‹¤ëŠ” ê²ƒë§Œ ì•Œì§€ êµ¬ì²´ì ì¸ ìƒì‚° ë°©ì‹ì€ ëª¨ë¥¸ë‹¤. ì–˜ ì…ì¥ì—ì„  ëª°ë¼ë„ ë¨. ê·¸ì € CreateUnits()ë§Œ í•´ì£¼ë©´ ë¨.
      • ğŸ§¾PatternAGenerator ìƒì†
        • íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ì„œë¸Œ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ 2ê°œ
          • ğŸ§¾PatternGenerator_A
            • ë§ˆë¦° 8ê°œ ë§Œë“œëŠ” ìƒì‚° ë°©ì‹.
            • CreateUnits() ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”© ğŸ‘‰ íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ë©”ì„œë“œ íŒ¨í„´
          • ğŸ§¾PatternGenerator_B
            • íŒŒì´ì–´ë±ƒ 3ê°œ, ë§ˆë¦° 5ê°œ ë§Œë“œëŠ” ìƒì‚° ë°©ì‹.
            • CreateUnits() ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”© ğŸ‘‰ íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ë©”ì„œë“œ íŒ¨í„´
    • ğŸ“œUseFactoryMethod
      • íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì¸ ğŸ§¾UnitGenerator íƒ€ì…ì˜ í¬ê¸° 2 ë°°ì—´ì„ ì„ ì–¸í•˜ê³ 
        • ì´ì— íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ì„œë¸Œ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì¸ ğŸ§¾PatternGenerator_A, ğŸ§¾PatternGenerator_B íƒ€ì… ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•˜ê³  ë„£ì–´ ì¤€ë‹¤.
      • ë‹¤í˜•ì„± 1 : ë¶€ëª¨ì¸ íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ íƒ€ì…ìœ¼ë¡œ ìì‹ë“¤ì¸ ê°ê° ë‘ê°€ì§€ì˜ ìƒì‚° ë°©ì‹ì„ ë‚˜íƒ€ë‚´ëŠ” A, Bë¥¼ ê°ê° ì°¸ì¡°í•˜ì—¬ ê°ìì˜ ìƒì‚° ë°©ì‹ëŒ€ë¡œ Unit ë“¤ì„ ìƒì„±í•´ì¤Œ.
        • CreateUnitsëŠ” ì¶”ìƒ í•¨ìˆ˜.
      • ë‹¤í˜•ì„± 2 : ë¶€ëª¨ì¸ Unit íƒ€ì…ìœ¼ë¡œ ìì‹ë“¤ì¸ marine, firebatë¥¼ ê°ê° ì°¸ì¡°í•˜ì—¬ ê°ìì˜ ë°©ì‹ëŒ€ë¡œ Attack() ìˆ˜í–‰
        • AttackëŠ” ì¶”ìƒ í•¨ìˆ˜.

    Unit

    ğŸ“œUnit.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;

public enum UnitType
{
	Marine,
	Firebat
}

abstract class Unit
{
	protected UnitType type;
	protected string name;
	protected int hp;
	protected int exp;
    public abstract void Attack();
}

    ğŸ“œFirebat.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;

class Firebat : Unit
{
	public Firebat()
	{
		type = UnitType.Firebat;
		name = "Firebat";
		hp = 120;
		exp = 15;

		Debug.Log (this.name + " : ìƒì„±!!");
	}

    public override void Attack()
    {
        Debug.Log(this.name + " : ê³µê²©!!");
    }
}

    ğŸ“œMarine.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;

class Marine : Unit
{
	public Marine()
	{
		type = UnitType.Marine;
		name = "Marine";
		hp = 100;
		exp = 50;

		Debug.Log (this.name + " : ìƒì„±!!");
	}

    public override void Attack()
    {
        Debug.Log(this.name + " : ê³µê²©!!");
    }
}


    íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ë©”ì„œë“œ íŒ¨í„´

    ğŸ“œUnitGenerator.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;

abstract class UnitGenerator
{
    public List<Unit> units = new List<Unit>();

    public List<Unit> getUnits()
    {
        return units;
    }

    // Factory Method
    public abstract void CreateUnits(); 
}

    ğŸ“œPatternGenerator.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;

class PatternGenerator_A : UnitGenerator
{
    public override void CreateUnits()
    {
        units.Add(new Marine());
        units.Add(new Marine());
        units.Add(new Marine());
        units.Add(new Marine());
        units.Add(new Marine());
        units.Add(new Marine());
        units.Add(new Marine());
        units.Add(new Marine());
    }
}

class PatternGenerator_B : UnitGenerator
{
    public override void CreateUnits()
    {
        units.Add(new Firebat());
        units.Add(new Firebat());
        units.Add(new Firebat());
        units.Add(new Marine());
        units.Add(new Marine());
        units.Add(new Marine());
        units.Add(new Marine());
    }
}


    íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ë©”ì„œë“œ íŒ¨í„´ì˜ ì‚¬ìš©

    ğŸ“œUnitFacotryMethod

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;

public class UseFactoryMethod : MonoBehaviour {

	UnitGenerator[] unitGenerators = null;

	void Start () {
		unitGenerators = new UnitGenerator[2];
		unitGenerators[0] = new PatternGenerator_A();
		unitGenerators[1] = new PatternGenerator_B();
	}

	public void DoMakeTypeA()
	{
		unitGenerators[0].CreateUnits();

        List<Unit> units = unitGenerators[0].getUnits();
        foreach (Unit unit in units)
        {
            unit.Attack();
        }
    }

	public void DoMakeTypeB()
	{
		unitGenerators[1].CreateUnits();

        List<Unit> units = unitGenerators[1].getUnits();
        foreach (Unit unit in units)
        {
            unit.Attack();
        }
    }
}


    ğŸ”” ì˜ˆì œ 2

    Database ì¢…ë¥˜ë§ˆë‹¤ ì ‘ì† ë°©ì‹ì´ ë‹¤ë¥´ë‹¤

    • ì ‘ì† ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ ìˆ˜í–‰í•˜ëŠ” í•¨ìˆ˜ëŠ” ê°€ìƒ(ì¶”ìƒ)í•¨ìˆ˜ì—¬ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.
      • Database ìì‹ë“¤ë§ˆë‹¤ ê°ì ì•Œì•„ì„œ ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”© í•˜ë„ë¡.
        • ConnectDatabase () í•¨ìˆ˜

    Database ì¢…ë¥˜ë§ˆë‹¤ ì‚½ì…ê³¼ ì„ íƒ ì—°ì‚°ì€ ê°™ë‹¤

    • ë¶€ëª¨ì¸ Databaseì—ë§Œ êµ¬í˜„í•´ë‘ê³  ìƒì†ë°›ê²Œë§Œ í•˜ë©´ ë¨. ì¬ì •ì˜ í•„ìš” ì—†ì´.
      • InsertData () í•¨ìˆ˜
      • SelectData () í•¨ìˆ˜

    êµ¬ì¡°

    • ğŸ“œDatabase ì¶”ìƒ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
      • ğŸ“œMySQL ìƒì†
        • ConnectDatabase () ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”©
      • ğŸ“œOracle ìƒì†
        • ConnectDatabase () ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”©
      • ğŸ“œInformix ìƒì†
        • ConnectDatabase () ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”©
    • ğŸ§¾DatabaseFactory ì¶”ìƒ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
      • íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
        • Database (Oracle, MySQL, Informix) ë“¤ì„ ìƒì„±í•˜ê³  ë¦¬í„´í•œë‹¤.
        • ì–´ë–¤ ë°ì´í„° ë² ì´ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•´ì•¼í• ì§€ëŠ” ëª¨ë¥¸ë‹¤. ì–˜ ì…ì¥ì—ì„  ëª°ë¼ë„ ë¨. ê·¸ì € Database (Oracle, MySQL, Informix) ë“¤ì„ ìƒì„±í•˜ê³  ë¦¬í„´ë§Œ í•´ì£¼ë©´ ë¨.
      • ğŸ§¾DatabaseGenerator ìƒì†
        • íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ì„œë¸Œ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
          • â­ì–´ë–¤ ì¢…ë¥˜ì˜ Databaseë¥¼ ìƒì„±í• ì§€ëŠ” ì–˜ê°€ ì •í•œë‹¤.
            • ì¢…ë¥˜ ì¶”ê°€ ìˆ˜ì •ì‹œ ì–˜ë§Œ ìˆ˜ì •í•´ì£¼ë©´ ë¨.
            • ìŠ¬ë¡¯ì— ë“¤ì–´ê°€ëŠ” Database ì¢…ë¥˜ ì˜¤ë¸Œì íŠ¸ì— ë”°ë¼ ë‹¤ë¥´ê²Œ ë¦¬í„´ëœë‹¤.
          • MakeDatabase() ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”© ğŸ‘‰ íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ë©”ì„œë“œ íŒ¨í„´
    • ğŸ“œUseFactoryMethod
      • ë‹¤í˜•ì„±1
        • DatabaseFactory factory = GetComponent<DatabaseGenerator>();
      • ë‹¤í˜•ì„±2
        • Database db = factory.MakeDatabase();

    Database

    ğŸ“œProduct.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;

public abstract class Database
{
	public string name;
	public double rows;

	// ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ë§ˆë‹¤ ì ‘ì† ë°©ì‹ì´ ë‹¤ë¥´ë‹¤.
	public abstract void ConnectDatabase ();

	// í‘œì¤€ SQLë¬¸ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤. (ì—…ë¬´ì²˜ë¦¬ ë°©ì‹ì´ ê°™ë‹¤.)
	public void InsertData ()
	{
		Debug.Log (name + " ì— ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤..");
	}

	public void SelectData ()
	{
		Debug.Log (name + " ì—ì„œ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ " + rows + "ê²Œ ì¡°íšŒí–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.");
	}
}


public class MySQL : Database
{
	public MySQL()
	{
		name = "MySQL";
        rows = 20;
	}

	public override void ConnectDatabase ()
	{
		Debug.Log (name + " ì— ì ‘ì†í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤..");
	}
}


public class Oracle : Database
{
	public Oracle()
	{
		name = "Oracle";
        rows = 10;
	}

	public override void ConnectDatabase ()
	{
		Debug.Log (name + " ì— ì ‘ì†í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤..");
	}
}


public class Informix : Database
{
	public Informix()
	{
		name = "Informix";
        rows = 40;
	}

	public override void ConnectDatabase ()
	{
		Debug.Log (name + " ì— ì ‘ì†í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤..");
	}
}


    íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ë©”ì„œë“œ íŒ¨í„´

    ğŸ“œDatabaseFactory.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;

public enum DBType
{
    MySQL,
    Oracle,
    Informix
};

public abstract class DatabaseFactory : MonoBehaviour
{
    // Factory Method
    public abstract Database MakeDatabase();
}

    ğŸ“œDatabaseGenerator.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;


public class DatabaseGenerator : DatabaseFactory
{

    // ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ë³€ê²½ì‹œ ì—¬ê¸°ì„œ íƒ€ì…ì„ ë³€ê²½í•œë‹¤.
    public DBType dbType = DBType.MySQL;

    public override Database MakeDatabase()
    {
        // íšŒì‚¬ ì‚¬ì •ì— ì˜í•´ ì–´ë–¤ ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì‚¬ìš©í• ì§€ ëª¨ë¥¸ë‹¤.
        // ê·¸ë˜ì„œ êµ¬ì¶•í•œ ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ì§€ìš°ì§€ ì•Šê³  ì¬ì‚¬ìš©ì‹œë¥¼ ëŒ€ë¹„í•œë‹¤.

        if (dbType == DBType.MySQL)
        {
            Debug.Log("MySQL use...");
            return new MySQL();
        }
        else if (dbType == DBType.Oracle)
        {
            Debug.Log("Oralce use...");
            return new Oracle();
        }
        else if (dbType == DBType.Informix)
        {
            Debug.Log("Informix use...");
            return new Informix();
        }
        else
        {
            return null;
        }
    }
}


    íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ë©”ì„œë“œ íŒ¨í„´ì˜ ì‚¬ìš©

    ğŸ“œUnitFacotryMethod

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;

public class UseFactoryMethod : MonoBehaviour {

	DatabaseFactory factory = null;
	Database db = null;

	void Start ()
	{
        factory = GetComponent<DatabaseGenerator>();

        // ì–´ë–¤ ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ê°€ ì‚¬ìš©ë ì§€ ì—¬ê¸°ì„œëŠ” ëª¨ë¥¸ë‹¤.
        // íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ë©”ì„œë“œì—ì„œ ì œê³µë˜ëŠ” ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ê·¸ëƒ¥ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤.
        db = factory.MakeDatabase();

		// ConnectDatabase()ëŠ” ì¶”ìƒ í•¨ìˆ˜ ì´ë¯€ë¡œ ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ì¢…ë¥˜ì— ë”°ë¼ ë‹¤ë¥´ê²Œ ì‹¤í–‰ëœë‹¤.
		db.ConnectDatabase();  

		// ë¶€ëª¨ì¸ DataBaseì—ì„œ ì •ì˜í•œ ë‚´ìš©ëŒ€ë¡œ ì‹¤í–‰ëœë‹¤. ì¦‰ ëª¨ë“  ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ê°€ ê³µí†µì ì¸ ë‚´ìš©ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‹¤í–‰ëœë‹¤.
		db.InsertData();
		db.SelectData();
	}
}


    ğŸ”” ì˜ˆì œ 3

    êµ¬ì¡°

    • ğŸ“œBoss ì¶”ìƒ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
      • ğŸ“œEventBoss ìƒì†
        • ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ê¸°ê°„ì—ë§Œ ë“±ì¥í•˜ëŠ” ë³´ìŠ¤ëª¹
        • Attack() ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”©
      • ğŸ“œNormalBoss ìƒì†
        • í‰ì†Œ ë³´ìŠ¤ ëª¹
        • Attack() ì˜¤ë²„ë¼ì´ë”©
    • ğŸ§¾BossFactory ì¶”ìƒ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
      • íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
        • Boss (EventBoss, NormalBoss) ë“¤ì„ ìƒì„±í•œë‹¤

    • ğŸ“œUseFactoryMethod
      • ë‹¤í˜•ì„±1
        • BossGenerator factory = GetComponent<BossGenerator>();
        • factory.CreateBoss(tran);

    Boss

    ğŸ“œBoss.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;

public enum BossType
{
	NormalBoss,
	EventBoss
}


abstract class Boss : MonoBehaviour
{
	protected BossType type;
	protected int hp;
	protected int exp;
    public abstract void Attack();
}

    ğŸ“œEventBoss.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;


class EventBoss : Boss
{
	void Start()
	{
		type = BossType.EventBoss;
		hp = 200;
		exp = 20;

        name = "Event Boss";
        Debug.Log (this.name + " : ì¶œí˜„!!");
	}

    public override void Attack()
    {
        Debug.Log(this.name + " : ê³µê²©!!");
    }
}

    ğŸ“œNormalBoss.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;


class NormalBoss : Boss
{
	void Start()
	{
		type = BossType.NormalBoss;
		hp = 200;
		exp = 15;

        name = "Normal Boss";
        Debug.Log (this.name + " : ì¶œí˜„!!");
	}

    public override void Attack()
    {
        Debug.Log(this.name + " : ê³µê²©!!");
    }
}


    íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ë©”ì„œë“œ íŒ¨í„´

    ğŸ“œBossFactory.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;


abstract class BossFactory : MonoBehaviour
{
	// Factory Method
	public abstract void CreateBoss(Transform tran); 
}

    ğŸ“œBossGenerator.cs

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;


class BossGenerator : BossFactory
{
    // ì„¤ë‚  ì½”ìŠ¤íŠ¬ ë³´ìŠ¤ëª¹ ì§€ì •
    public BossType type = BossType.EventBoss;
    public GameObject _normalBoss;
    public GameObject _eventBoss;

    public override void CreateBoss(Transform tran)
	{
        if (type == BossType.NormalBoss)
        {
            GameObject boss = Instantiate(_normalBoss) as GameObject;
            boss.transform.position = tran.position;
            boss.transform.localRotation = tran.localRotation;
        }
        else if (type == BossType.EventBoss)
        {
            GameObject boss = Instantiate(_eventBoss) as GameObject;
            boss.transform.position = tran.position;
            boss.transform.localRotation = tran.localRotation;
        }
    }
}


    íŒ©í† ë¦¬ ë©”ì„œë“œ íŒ¨í„´ì˜ ì‚¬ìš©

    ğŸ“œUnitFacotryMethod

    using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;
using UnityEngine.UI;

public class UseFactoryMethod : MonoBehaviour {

    BossGenerator factory = null;
    public Text desc;

	void Start () {
        //factory = new BossGenerator();
        factory = GetComponent<BossGenerator>();

        if (factory.type == BossType.NormalBoss)
        {
            desc.text = "Normal Boss";
        }
        else if (factory.type == BossType.EventBoss)
        {
            desc.text = "Event Boss";
        }

        // ë¡œì§ì— ë”°ë¼ íŠ¹ì • ìœ„ì¹˜ ì§€ì •
        Transform tran = this.gameObject.transform;

        // ë¬´ì—‡ì´ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì§ˆì§€ ì—¬ê¸°ì„œëŠ” ëª¨ë¥¸ë‹¤.
        // ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ê¸°ê°„ì— ë§ì¶° íŒ©í† ë¦¬ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì—ì„œ íƒ€ì…ì´ ë³€ê²½ë˜ì—ˆë‹¤ë©´
        // í•´ë‹¹ ë³´ìŠ¤ê°€ ë“±ì¥í•˜ê²Œ ëœë‹¤.
        factory.CreateBoss(tran);
    }
}
